discourse_list.title: MIP4c2-SP28: Allow any type of voting scheme in MIP40c3

content.content: Preamble MIP4c2-SP#: 28 MIP to be amended: 40 Author(s): @psychonaut Contributors: Tags: template Status: Withdrawn Date Proposed: 2022-09-26 Date Ratified: <yyyy-mm-dd> Forum URL: https://forum.makerdao.com/t/mip4c2-sp28-allow-any-type-of-voting-scheme-in-mip40c3/18100   Specification  Motivation  Currently MIP40c3 subproposals must use rank-choice voting Approval voting is simpler to reason about than rank-choice MIP40c3 need not specify the type of voting to use   Amended MIPs and Components  MIP40c3 subproposal template   Amendment Pull Request  PR
content.GPT-summary: The post is a proposal to amend MIP40c3 to allow any type of voting scheme instead of just rank-choice voting. The author explains the motivation behind the proposal and provides a subproposal template. The post does not advertise the proposal, but a forum URL is provided for further discussion. The post may be of interest to third parties who want to give constructive criticism, ask questions, or audit and review the proposal.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: Some feedback from @prose11 via Discord,  image1250×186 41.5 KB  Hence, I hereby withdraw this amendment.
This subproposal has been withdrawn by its author.
